data.eml:eml: Description of Metarhabditis giennensis sp. n. (Nematoda, Rhabditida, Rhabditidae) from decaying wood of a riverbank forest in the southern Iberian Peninsula

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Abolafia, Joaquín, Peña-Santiago, Reyes (2019): Description of Metarhabditis giennensis sp. n. (Nematoda, Rhabditida, Rhabditidae) from decaying wood of a riverbank forest in the southern Iberian Peninsula. Zootaxa 4652 (1): 145-154, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4652.1.8
